items.sentence: Tom could've stayed in Boston if he'd wanted to.
Tom watched in envy as Mary rode by on her pony.
When I saw Tom crying, I started to cry as well.
Don't forget that Tom is much stronger than you.
Tom, I've got a crisis here. I need your advice.
We've decided never to stay at that hotel again.
Few people stay here longer than a month or two.
I'll give you three reasons why you should stay.
Tom is always willing to help people in trouble.
Tom is waiting in front of the building for you.
